channel.title: How do you stop npc's from walking over objects?
channel.description: When you attack an npc they will go over everything to attack you including objects. How do you stop this?

item.title: How do you stop npc's from walking over objects?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

I’m trying to make an array of all coordinates where NPC’s cant walk on, but for now just change their walkable coordinates in autospawn.cfg

Read full topic
item.source: How do you stop npc's from walking over objects?
